Northland Brynderwyns state highway closure will cost everyone, truck driver warns https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-brynderwyns-state-highway-closure-will-cost-everyone-truck-driver-warns/VJ43KKV3RBD7THEZSYCMPKGU3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-brynderwyns-state-highway-closure-will-cost-everyone-truck-driver-warns/VJ43KKV3RBD7THEZSYCMPKGU3Q/ Denise PiperThe extra costs for taking the detour will have to be passed on, truck drivers say.
